languages.text: Авгуры запеленговали на поверхности планеты останки имперского корабля. Судя по знакам на обшивке, он принадлежал Инквизиции и потерпел крушение много веков назад. Причины катастрофы неясны, как и то, присутствуют ли на борту источники угрозы — остов корабля погружен в ледник, что затрудняет наблюдение.

traits.locale_text: "Лорд-капитан, авгуры запеленговали на поверхности планеты останки имперского корабля. Судя по знакам на обшивке, он принадлежал Инквизиции и потерпел крушение много веков назад. Причины катастрофы неясны, как и то, присутствуют ли на борту источники угрозы — остав корабля погружен в ледник, что затрудняет наблюдение. Каковы будут ваши распоряжения?"

languages.text: The augurs detected the remains of an Imperium vessel down on the surface of this planet. Judging by the emblems on the hull, it once belonged to the Inquisition and crashed many centuries ago. The reasons are unknown and there is no way to tell what might lie in wait. The bulk of the ship has sunk into a glacier, which makes further analysis difficult.
languages.original_text: Авгуры запеленговали на поверхности планеты останки имперского корабля. Судя по знакам на обшивке, он принадлежал Инквизиции и потерпел крушение много веков назад. Причины катастрофы неясны, как и то, присутствуют ли на борту источники угрозы — остов корабля погружен в ледник, что затрудняет наблюдение.

traits.locale_text: The augurs detected the remains of a vessel of the Imperium down on the surface of this planet. Judging by the emblems on the hull, it once belonged to the Inquisition and crashed many centuries ago. The reasons are unknown and there is no way to tell whether there are any sources of danger on the board. The bulk of the ship has sunk into a glacier, which makes observation difficult.

The augurs detected the remains of an Imperium vessel down on the surface of this planet. Judging by the emblems on the hull, it once belonged to the Inquisition and crashed many centuries ago. languages.text: Les augures ont découvert l'épave d'un vaisseau de l'Imperium à la surface de cette planète. Il s'est écrasé voilà des siècles, mais si l'on en croit les emblèmes encore visibles sur son fuselage, il appartenait à l'Inquisition. On ignore tout des circonstances de l'accident ou des dangers qu'il pourrait encore receler. Une bonne partie de sa coque s'est enfoncée dans un glacier, ce qui rend toute analyse complémentaire difficile.
languages.original_text: The augurs detected the remains of an Imperium vessel down on the surface of this planet. Judging by the emblems on the hull, it once belonged to the Inquisition and crashed many centuries ago. The reasons are unknown and there is no way to tell what might lie in wait. The bulk of the ship has sunk into a glacier, which makes further analysis difficult.

traits.locale_text: Les augures ont découvert l'épave d'un vaisseau de l'Imperium à la surface de cette planète. Il s'est écrasé voilà des siècles, mais si l'on en croit les emblèmes encore visibles sur son fuselage, il appartenait à l'Inquisition. On ignore tout des circonstances de l'accident ou des dangers qu'il pourrait encore receler. Une bonne partie de sa coque s'est enfoncée dans un glacier, ce qui rend toute analyse complémentaire difficile.

languages.text: 俄歇矩阵探测到这颗行星表面有一艘帝国飞船的残骸。舰体上的徽章表明，这艘船曾属于审判庭，是几百年前坠毁的。坠毁原因不明，也无从得知船上会有什么东西。大部分船体已经沉入冰川之中，无法进行进一步分析。
languages.original_text: The augurs detected the remains of an Imperium vessel down on the surface of this planet. Judging by the emblems on the hull, it once belonged to the Inquisition and crashed many centuries ago. The reasons are unknown and there is no way to tell what might lie in wait. The bulk of the ship has sunk into a glacier, which makes further analysis difficult.

traits.locale_text: 俄歇矩阵探测到这颗行星表面有一艘帝国飞船的残骸。舰体上的徽章表明，这艘船曾属于审判庭，是几百年前坠毁的。坠毁原因不明，也无从得知船上会有什么东西。大部分船体已经沉入冰川之中，无法进行进一步分析。

languages.text: Die Auguren haben auf der Oberfläche dieses Planeten die Überreste eines Imperiumsschiffs entdeckt. Den Symbolen auf dem Rumpf zufolge hat es einst der Inquisition gehört und ist vor vielen Jahrhunderten abgestürzt. Die Gründe dafür sind unbekannt, und man weiß nicht, was auf dem Schiff wartet. Der Großteil des Schiffs ist in einen Gletscher abgesunken, was eine weitere Analyse erschwert.
languages.original_text: The augurs detected the remains of an Imperium vessel down on the surface of this planet. Judging by the emblems on the hull, it once belonged to the Inquisition and crashed many centuries ago. The reasons are unknown and there is no way to tell what might lie in wait. The bulk of the ship has sunk into a glacier, which makes further analysis difficult.

traits.locale_text: Die Auguren haben auf der Oberfläche dieses Planeten die Überreste eines Imperiumsschiffs entdeckt. Den Symbolen auf dem Rumpf zufolge hat es einst der Inquisition gehört und ist vor vielen Jahrhunderten abgestürzt. Die Gründe dafür sind unbekannt, und man weiß nicht, was auf dem Schiff wartet. Der Großteil des Schiffs ist in einen Gletscher abgesunken, was eine weitere Analyse erschwert.

languages.text: Los augures han encontrado los restos de una nave del Imperium en la superficie de este planeta. A juzgar por los emblemas del casco, pertenecía a la Inquisición y se estrelló muchos siglos atrás. Se desconocen las razones y no hay forma de saber qué guarda en su interior. Gran parte de la nave se ha hundido en un glaciar, lo que dificulta un análisis más detallado.
languages.original_text: The augurs detected the remains of an Imperium vessel down on the surface of this planet. Judging by the emblems on the hull, it once belonged to the Inquisition and crashed many centuries ago. The reasons are unknown and there is no way to tell what might lie in wait. The bulk of the ship has sunk into a glacier, which makes further analysis difficult.

traits.locale_text: Los augures han encontrado los restos de una nave del Imperium en la superficie de este planeta. A juzgar por los emblemas del casco, pertenecía a la Inquisición y se estrelló muchos siglos atrás. Se desconocen las razones y no hay forma de saber qué guarda en su interior. Gran parte de la nave se ha hundido en un glaciar, lo que dificulta un análisis más detallado.

languages.text: スキャナーは、この惑星の表面に帝国船の残骸の存在を検出した。船体の紋章から判断すると、それはかつて異端審問庁の船で、何世紀も前に墜落したようだった。墜落した理由は不明で、そこに何が待ち受けているのか知る術はない。船の大部分が氷河に沈んでいて、これ以上の分析は困難だ。
languages.original_text: The augurs detected the remains of an Imperium vessel down on the surface of this planet. Judging by the emblems on the hull, it once belonged to the Inquisition and crashed many centuries ago. The reasons are unknown and there is no way to tell what might lie in wait. The bulk of the ship has sunk into a glacier, which makes further analysis difficult.

traits.locale_text: スキャナーは、この惑星の表面に帝国船の残骸の存在を検出した。船体の紋章から判断すると、それはかつて異端審問庁の船で、何世紀も前に墜落したようだった。墜落した理由は不明で、そこに何が待ち受けているのか知る術はない。船の大部分が氷河に沈んでいて、これ以上の分析は困難だ。

languages.text: Alametler, bu gezegenin yüzeyinde bir İmparatorluk gemisinin kalıntılarının bulunduğunu tespit etti. Gövdesindeki amblemlere bakılacak olursa eskiden Engizisyon'a aitmiş ve buraya yüzyıllar önce çakılmış. Sebepleri meçhul ve içinde bizi neyin beklediğini bilmemizin imkânı yok. Geminin önemli bir bölümü bir buzula girmiş, bu da analizimizi derinleştirmemizi güçleştiriyor.
languages.original_text: The augurs detected the remains of an Imperium vessel down on the surface of this planet. Judging by the emblems on the hull, it once belonged to the Inquisition and crashed many centuries ago. The reasons are unknown and there is no way to tell what might lie in wait. The bulk of the ship has sunk into a glacier, which makes further analysis difficult.
